attributes.action: reject the recommendation of the recent report by the Consultative Group on the Past to pay £12,000 to families of terrorists killed during the Troubles in Northern Ireland, as well as to the families of their victims.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This report recommends that Loyalist and Republican terrorists - in many cases murderers - are regarded as morally equivalent to their civilian, police, and armed services victims. It is morally repugnant, and will also reopen divisions and resentments which Northern Ireland is currently seeking to overcome. Payments, if made, should only be made to the families of terrorist victims.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
